name: If
description: Executes the code inside if the condition is true.

codeInside.name: Then
codeInside.description: The code to execute if the condition is true.

codeInside.name: Else
codeInside.description: The code to execute if the condition is false.

name: Function call
description: Executes the code inside the function it calls.

name: Repeat from to loop
description: Executes the code inside the loop for each number between 2 numbers

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: The starting number of the loop

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: The ending number of the loop

parameters.name: Step
parameters.description: How much the loop changes by each iteration

codeInside.name: Loop iteration
codeInside.description: The code to execute for each iteration.

variables.name: Value
variables.description: The current value the loop is on.

name: Repeat while loop
description: Executes the code inside the loop while the condition is true.

codeInside.name: Loop iteration
codeInside.description: The code to execute for each iteration.

variables.name: Iteration
variables.description: The current iteration the loop is on.

name: Wait
description: Waits for a certain amount of time.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.description: The amount of time to wait, in miliseconds.

name: Set variable
description: Sets a specified variable to a value.

parameters.name: Variable
parameters.description: The variable you want to set.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: The value you want to set the variable to.
